name: Yanfei
title: Wise Innocence: Yanfei
desc: One who fails to revise the classics is liable to fall foul of the law.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Yanfei to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Signed Edict
skills.desc: Deals 3 <span style="color:#FF9999FF">Pyro DMG and attaches <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Scarlet Seal to this character.

skills.name: Done Deal
skills.desc: Deals 3 <span style="color:#FF9999FF">Pyro DMG, attaches <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Scarlet Seal and <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Brilliance to this character.
